channel.title: Import Black Mesa Weapons and Animations into HL2
channel.description:
I am not sure if this is the right subforum for this, nor if this topic has been done before. Basically, I want to do [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=15113']this[/url], except the opposite. I want to port Black Mesa skins and animations into Half-Life 2. Well, actually, I only really want the SPAS-12 Shotgun skin and animations from BM. I have both of them installed and on Steam. I have ported over a bunch of custom models and animations so I have basic experience with this.
So, is this possible? If so, how can I do this?
